Having clocked 60 hours in it and counting, I\'m making a thread about the wonderful, wonderful indie game Magicka.

What is it? It\'s an isometric, heavily magic-based hack-and-slash gorefest set in a pop culture reference oversaturated, cartoony fantasy world. Although you do have a sword, your main weapon is your arsenal of spells, which you create by combining eight different elements. It takes some getting used to, but the reward in the form of an incredible variety of spells is well worth it.
